commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
• Home
  • Features
  • Testimonials
  • Faq
  • About Us

Privacy Policy

Last Revised on September 4, 2025. Please read carefully how we collect, use and protect your information.

On This Page

Scope of Services

Types of Information We Collect

How We Collect Your Information

How We Use Your Information

Data Transfer

Cookies

Data Security

Links to Third-Party Sites

Social Network Plugins

Sharing Personal Information

Children

Changes to This Policy

Jurisdiction & Applicability

Newsletter

How to Contact Us

Welcome

Welcome to the Pridesports Privacy Policy for https://pridesports.in/ (the “Website”). This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use and disclose information from our users, including with respect to the Website and its related content, applications, services, tools and features (collectively with the Website, the “Services”).

By using, accessing, or downloading anything on the Services, you agree to our Terms of Service and this Privacy Policy.

1. Scope of Services

connect Clients and their children with the right sports academy in their vicinity, ensuring they have a great experience through our experience management platform.

  1. 1.1 Listing Services
  • Display academy offerings, facilities, and programs.
  • Connect directly with Clients seeking academies.
  • Engage with potential clients via platform features.
  1. 1.2 Experience Management Services
  • Complaint Management: Clients can report issues and communicate with academies.
  • Reports: child’s progress via periodic reports.
  • Reviews & Ratings: Clients can leave authentic feedback.
  • Events: View and register for academy events and competitions.

2. Types of Information We Collect

We may collect personal and non-personal information, including but not limited to:

  • Client details (name, email, phone, child’s age, preferences).
  • Academy details (name, programs, contact info, reports).
  • Usage data (device, IP, browser, clickstream, cookies).
  • Purchase/content history, interactions, and analytics data.

3. How We Collect Your Information

We collect information directly from Clients and Academies, automatically through usage, communications, and sometimes from third-party integrations such as social media.

4. How We Use Your Information

  • Provide, maintain, and improve our Services.
  • Process transactions and manage accounts.
  • Personalize recommendations and experiences.
  • Send confirmations, invoices, updates, and alerts.
  • Detect and prevent fraud, unauthorized use, or illegal activity.

5. Data Transfer

We may share your information with affiliates, vendors, and service providers strictly for service delivery, always ensuring compliance with applicable data protection laws.

6. Cookies

We use cookies to improve functionality, remember preferences, prevent fraud, and enhance security. You may disable cookies in your browser, but some features may not function properly.

7. Data Security

We implement SSL, encryption, and organizational safeguards to protect your information. While we take reasonable precautions, no system is fully secure. You are responsible for keeping your credentials safe.

8. Links to Third-Party Sites

Our Website may link to external sites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices. Please review their policies when visiting those websites.

9. Social Network Plugins

Our Website may include social plugins. These operate under the privacy policies of the respective networks.

10. Sharing Personal Information

We do not share your personal data without your consent except as required by law, to protect rights, or in the case of business transfers with prior notice.

11. Children

Users under 18 may only use the Services with parental consent. We are not liable for misuse by minors in violation of this section.

12. Changes to This Policy

We may revise this Privacy Policy from time to time. The updated date will be posted at the top of this page.

13. Jurisdiction & Applicability

This policy is governed by Indian law and applies only to residents of India. Courts in India shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

14. Newsletter

By subscribing, you agree to receive newsletters. You may unsubscribe anytime using the link in the email footer.

15. How to Contact Us

If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

Email: contact@pridesports.in

Phone: +91 99539 66978

Mailing Address: G 403 Shanti Vihar, Sector 95, Gurugram, Haryana - 122505
